original_text: And he said, Put thine hand into thy bosom again. And he put his hand into his bosom again; and plucked it out of his bosom, and, behold, it was turned again as his other flesh.
korean_text: 이르시되 네 손을 다시 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 다시 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손이 본래의 살로 되돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: Put thine hand into thy bosom again
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 다시 네 품에 넣으라

sentences.original_text: And he put his hand into his bosom again
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 손을 다시 자기 품에 넣었고

sentences.original_text: and plucked it out of his bosom
it was turned again as his other flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 다시 그의 다른 살처럼 변했더라
